command.usage:
Usage: /[MinecraftCommandName] [OPTION]
  login     Sign in with [OAuth2ProviderName].
            On the 1st time, links your [OAuth2ProviderName] account to your Minecraft account.
  unlink    Unlink your Minecraft account from your [OAuth2ProviderName] account.
  info      Show information about your linked [OAuth2ProviderName] account.
command.linked:
<green>Welcome [OAuth2Username]!
Your Minecraft [MinecraftUsername] and [OAuth2ProviderName] accounts have been linked successfully!</green>
command.notlinked:
<red>But, [MinecraftUsername], your Minecraft account is not even linked to a [OAuth2ProviderName] account!
Use /[MinecraftCommandName] login to do so.</red>
command.unlinked: <green>Your Minecraft account [MinecraftUsername] has been unlinked successfully from your [OAuth2ProviderName] account!</green>
command.alreadyloggedin: <red>But, [OAuth2Username], you are already logged in as [MinecraftUsername]!</red>
command.notloggedin:
<red>Are you really [OAuth2Username]? You aren't logged in with [OAuth2ProviderName], [MinecraftUsername]!
Log in using /[MinecraftCommandName] login to join the server.</red>
command.info: <blue>Your Minecraft account [MinecraftUsername] is linked to [OAuth2ProviderName] account [OAuth2Username].</blue>
command.noperms: <red>But, [MinecraftUsername], you don't have permission to use this command.</red>
command.playeronly: <red>This command is only for real players!</red>
